description.en: Teriyaki Salmon - a classic north america dish.
description.zh: Teriyaki 三文鱼 - a classic north america dish.
description.sv: Teriyaki lax - a classic north america dish.

en: 2 pcs salmon fillet
15 ml soy sauce
1 tbsp lemon juice
zh: 2 pcs 三文鱼 fillet
15 ml 酱油
1 tbsp 柠檬 juice
sv: 2 pcs lax fillet
15 ml sojasås
1 tbsp citron juice

en: Prepare the main ingredients: salmon fillet, soy sauce, lemon juice.
Season or marinate as needed for flavor.
Preheat the oven or pan to the required temperature.
Cook using appropriate method (grill, sauté, bake, or simmer) until done.
Adjust seasoning and serve hot with preferred sides.
zh: Prepare the main ingredients: 三文鱼 fillet, 酱油, 柠檬 juice.
Season or marinate as needed for flavor.
Preheat the oven or pan to the required temperature.
Cook using appropriate method (grill, sauté, bake, or simmer) until done.
Adjust seasoning and serve hot with preferred sides.
sv: Prepare the main ingredients: lax fillet, sojasås, citron juice.
Season or marinate as needed for flavor.
Preheat the oven or pan to the required temperature.
Cook using appropriate method (grill, sauté, bake, or simmer) until done.
Adjust seasoning and serve hot with preferred sides.

description.en: Grilled Salmon with Lemon - a classic mediterranean dish.

15 ml soy sauce

sv: 2 pcs lax fillet
15 ml sojasås

en: Prepare the main ingredients: salmon fillet, soy sauce, lemon juice.
Season or marinate as needed for flavor.
Serve immediately with rice or bread.

Adjust seasoning and serve hot with preferred sides.

description.en: Tuna Sashimi - a classic southern europe dish.

en: 300 g tuna
15 ml soy sauce
1 tbsp lemon juice
zh: 300 g 金枪鱼
15 ml 酱油
1 tbsp 柠檬 juice
sv: 300 g tonfisk
15 ml sojasås
1 tbsp citron juice

en: Prepare the main ingredients: tuna, soy sauce, lemon juice.
Season or marinate as needed for flavor.
Rest the cooked dish for a few minutes before serving.
Cook using appropriate method (grill, sauté, bake, or simmer) until done.
Adjust seasoning and serve hot with preferred sides.

description.en: Classic Fish and Chips - a classic mediterranean dish.
description.zh: Classic Fish and Chips - a classic mediterranean dish.
description.sv: Classic Fish and Chips - a classic mediterranean dish.

en: 300 g shrimp
20 g butter
2 cloves garlic
zh: 300 g 虾
20 g 黄油
2 cloves 大蒜
sv: 300 g räkor
20 g smör
2 cloves vitlök

en: Prepare the main ingredients: shrimp, butter, garlic.
Season or marinate as needed for flavor.
Garnish with fresh herbs and a squeeze of lemon.
Cook using appropriate method (grill, sauté, bake, or simmer) until done.
Adjust seasoning and serve hot with preferred sides.
